title: No free Win anymore In Promos?
body: So i was Plat 4 got demoted to Plat 5, but now i re enter in series but we normally should get 1 free win right? but i didn't get any why is that? is it a bug or you guys change the rule ? please check, if this is a bug this is frustrating

replies.body: Pretty sure that stops in platinum, free wins only apply in gold and below right?
